headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About Halliburton (HAL) Q2 Earnings
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Halliburton (HAL) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

raw.headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About Halliburton (HAL) Q2 Earnings

headline: Liberty Energy Q2 Earnings Miss, Sales Beat Estimates, Both Fall Y/Y
summary: LBRT's second-quarter earnings miss estimates and fall year over year, due to increased macroeconomic uncertainty and energy sector volatility.

raw.headline: Liberty Energy Q2 Earnings Miss, Sales Beat Estimates, Both Fall Y/Y
raw.summary: LBRT's second-quarter earnings miss estimates and fall year over year, due to increased macroeconomic uncertainty and energy sector volatility.

headline: Ovintiv Q2 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: OVV expects total production of 600-620 MBOE/d, with oil and condensate at 205-209 Mbbls/d and NGLs at 93-96 Mbbls/d for full-year 2025.

raw.headline: Ovintiv Q2 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
raw.summary: OVV expects total production of 600-620 MBOE/d, with oil and condensate at 205-209 Mbbls/d and NGLs at 93-96 Mbbls/d for full-year 2025.
